TEST.0.title: 2024 North Carolina Division B Regional 1
TEST.0.customHeader:
Names of participants: (Please print neatly)

School Name:

Check your team: ◻ Varsity ◻ JV1 JV2 ◻ JV3

Warning: Do not open this packet until given permission to do so.

Note: There are useful notes after this page.

CIPHER.33.cipherString: An attitude of gratitude is the best outfit to wear when you're looking for success and happiness.
CIPHER.33.question: Decode this quote from Debasish Mridha which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.33.author: Debasish Mridha

CIPHER.45.cipherString: Science is for those who learn, poetry for those who know.
CIPHER.45.question: Decode this quote from J. Roux which has been encoded with the Atbash Cipher.
CIPHER.45.author: J. Roux.

CIPHER.48.cipherString: Without hope, there we fail to be happy.
CIPHER.48.question: The following strange headlines encode a quote by Lailah Gifty Akita using a Baconian cipher. You are told that the deciphered text contains FAIL somewhere.
CIPHER.48.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

CIPHER.50.cipherString: Will you look back on life and say, I wish I had, or I'm glad I did ?
CIPHER.50.question: A quote by Zig Ziglar has been encoded using the FractionatedMorse Cipher for you to decode. You are told that the quote has WILL Y in it corresponding to the encoded text E Q R U S B F L.
CIPHER.50.author: Zig Ziglar

CIPHER.53.cipherString: Focus on where you want to go, not on what you fear.
CIPHER.53.question: The following odd symbols were found on a sheet of paper when a tomb was opened, but you recognized it as the Baconian alphabet, written by a prankster. It turns out to be a quote by Anthony Robbins.  What does it say?
CIPHER.53.author: Anthony Robbins

CIPHER.35.cipherString: I think the essence of wisdom is emancipation, as far as possible, from the tyranny of the here and now.
CIPHER.35.question: Decode this quote from Bertrand Russell which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.35.author: Bertrand Russell

CIPHER.44.cipherString: And if ye only trust yourselves, other souls will trust you.
CIPHER.44.question: The following letters encode a quote by Goethe using a Baconian alphabet. What does it say?
CIPHER.44.author: Goethe.

CIPHER.57.cipherString: Nobody with style measures success in money. They measure it on the good impact they have on others.
CIPHER.57.question: A quote by Marco Rathmann has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with HERS.
CIPHER.57.author: Marco Rathmann

CIPHER.52.cipherString: If you care about something enough, you'll find a way to make it happen.
CIPHER.52.question: The following quote by Roy T. Bennett needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of MARS and polybius key of EXOPLANETARY.
CIPHER.52.author: Roy T. Bennett

CIPHER.39.cipherString: Reflect upon your present blessings, of which every man has plenty; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
CIPHER.39.question: Solve this quote by Charles Dickens that has been encoded as a Patristocrat using a K2 keyword.  You are told that it ends with SOME.
CIPHER.39.author: Charles Dickens

CIPHER.49.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 80924 6475 13625 . What do they decode to?

CIPHER.37.cipherString: My theory is that if you look confident you can pull off anything - even if you have no clue what you're doing.
CIPHER.37.question: A quote by Jessica Alba has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode. You are told that it ends with DOING.
CIPHER.37.author: Jessica Alba

CIPHER.36.cipherString: Lyrical poetry is much the same in every age, as the songs of the nightingales in every spring-time.
CIPHER.36.question: Decode this quote from Heinrich Heine which has been encoded with a Caesar Cipher.
CIPHER.36.author: Heine.

CIPHER.54.cipherString: Cada gozo que nos llega es sólo para fortalecernos para un trabajo mayor que ha de tener éxito.
CIPHER.54.question: Solve this Xenocrypt which is a translation of a quote by Johann Gottlieb Fichte into Spanish and has been encoded with a K1 alphabet using an English keyword.  It starts with CADA.
CIPHER.54.author: Johann Gottlieb Fichte
CIPHER.54.translation: Every joy that comes to us is only to strengthen us for some greater labour that is to succeed.

CIPHER.47.cipherString: The role of science should be to investigate the unexplained, not explain the uninvestigated.
CIPHER.47.question: Decode this quote from Stephen Rorke which has been encoded with a Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told it contains the letters INVEST.
CIPHER.47.author: Stephen Rorke

CIPHER.40.cipherString: You cannot truly listen to anyone and do anything else at the same time.
CIPHER.40.question: The following quote by M. Scott Peck needs to be decoded with the Nihilist Substitution Cipher with a keyword of APHID and polybius key of ENTOMOLOGIST.
CIPHER.40.author: M. Scott Peck

CIPHER.43.cipherString: Instead of reality being passively recorded by the brain, it is actively constructed by it.
CIPHER.43.question: A quote by David Eagleman has been encoded using the K1 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.43.author: David Eagleman

CIPHER.55.cipherString: The only journey is the one within.
CIPHER.55.question: The following quote by Rainer Maria Rilke needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=11 and b=7.
CIPHER.55.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

CIPHER.41.cipherString: When ever sum thing bad happens, keep psalm, take a phew deep breaths and shift the phocus to sum thing positive.
CIPHER.41.question: Decode the message from Roy T. Bennett which was encoded with a K1 Aristocrat Cipher (after being run through a ‘sus' dictation system).
CIPHER.41.author: Roy T. Bennett

CIPHER.34.cipherString: Opportunity doesn't make appointments, you have to be ready when it arrives.
CIPHER.34.question: The following quote by Tim Fargo needs to be decoded with the Porta Cipher with a keyword of TIME.
CIPHER.34.author: Tim Fargo

CIPHER.56.cipherString: Do you realize how hard it is to keep your mind clear when somebody's telling you to keep your mind clear?
CIPHER.56.question: A quote by Miguel de Tom Upton has been encoded using the K2 Aristocrat Cipher for you to decode.
CIPHER.56.author: Tom Upton

CIPHER.46.question: The following cryptarithm provides the key to decoding the values 48591 28403 0967. What do they decode to?

CIPHER.42.cipherString: Sometimes the best solution is the most painful option
CIPHER.42.question: Decode this quote from Jacinta Mpalyenkana which has been encoded with the Complete Columnar Cipher.  You are told that it contains the letters ESTS.
CIPHER.42.author: Dr. Jacinta Mpalyenkana, Ph.D, MBA

CIPHER.38.question: The following quote by Horace needs to be decoded with the Affine Cipher where a=7 and b=4.
CIPHER.38.author: Horace

CIPHER.51.cipherString: There is as much eloquence in the tone of voice, in the eyes, and in the air of a speaker, as in his choice of words.
CIPHER.51.question: Decode this quote from François de La Rochefoucauld which has been encoded with an Aristocrat Cipher.
CIPHER.51.author: LA ROCHEFOUCAULD
